class.name: AmazonSnsTrigger
class.description: Base class for Amazon SNS Trigger. Trigger starts build every time SNS event is registered on HTTP(S) endpoint.

param.name: displayName
param.description: Name to be displayed for current trigger.

param.name: triggerUuid
param.description: Unique id of the trigger. Unique in the Build Configuration scope. Required for endpoint handler.

param.name: triggerBuildTypeExternalId
param.description: Reference to the current build type. Specify here id of the build type where this trigger is located.

example.description: Basic Amazon SNS Trigger configuration. Where 'Build' is the current Build Configuration name.
